ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Enough! I get home to recieve 50 new emails, out of which at least 30 were complaints. I do agree with Inferno, though, the whole council should decide before

Enough!

I get home to recieve 50 new emails, out of which at least 30 were 
complaints. I do agree with Inferno, though, the whole council should decide 
before booting someone.

Thecode, Inferno, JP, and KSLawdogg, if you guys could tell me when you are 
available for a chat session, we could meet and give Thecode the benefit of a 
doubt, and perhaps let him and us explain a few things.

Thecode, if you could send me an email about who exactly I did nothing about 
that moded, I'll see if I missed something or if you have the wrong 
definition of moding. 

And finally, please send further arguments over private email, no one wants 
to read tons of arguments. Thanx.
